child.pub-comments: “The name TN is chosen because all branches have basic ta/ne as 1sg./2sg. Independent pronouns” (Bender 2003:105).

root.pub-comments: “Note that the assumed structure means that an Omotic isogloss must occur in any of these combinations; all of TN, Aroid, Dizoid; Dizoid and Aroid. The combination of TN-D does not determine an isogloss for Omotic because it is not found in one of the two highest-level branches Tn and Aroid” (Bender 2003:105).
root.tree-val: Omotic, a subtree of Afroasiatic: Bender 2003

tree.description: Omotic, a subtree of Afroasiatic: Bender 2003
